_header: Uncomely in cloister I cower full of care
_description: The lament of the monk on the difficulty of learning church music — fifty-two long alliterative lines

BLAru292.First Lines:
Un comly in cloystre I coure ful of careI loke as a lurdeyn and
                    listne til my lare…
BLAru292.Last Lines:
…il hayl were yn boren ȝif yn make defautÞan sais
                    oure mayster que vos reu ne vawt
